comments:
RC2

* Added a custom task in a folder (Date.class from the output location of a 
project), named the task "date".
* Went back to edit the task
* selected task, pressed "Edit"
* dialog opened, pressed OK
* dialog did not close, this was in the log

The only way I could reproduce this problem was to remove the associated JAR / 
folder of the task I was editing. If so then this is really a duplicate of bug 
34498.

I verified that causes the problem (and is likely what I did to cause the 
problem but did not realize it). Lets mark bug 34498 as a dup of this one, and 
fix the "source" of the problem.
*** Bug 34498 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed in AntPage, Ant RuntimePreferencePage, AntTasksPage and AntTypesPage.
Double checked with Luc.
